scripts.startx: cd ../client/visualizer && npm run prod && cp -r bc20 ../../frontend/public && cd ../../frontend && BROWSER=none react-scripts start
scripts.start: cd ../client/visualizer && npm run prod && cp -r bc20 ../../frontend/public && cd ../../frontend && react-scripts start
scripts.build: rm -rf build && cd ../client/visualizer && npm run prod && cp -r bc20 ../../frontend/public && cd ../../frontend && react-scripts build
scripts.buildnogame: rm -rf build && rm -rf public/bc20 && react-scripts build
